System.Name: SFG20
System.Description: SFG20 is the essential tool for facilities managers, building owners, contractors and consultants, enabling you to stay compliant - saving time, energy and money. Assigns category classification to building elements based on SFG20 coding. It facilitates the identification of maintainable assets, providing a benchmark for optimum maintenance to avoid over or under maintaining.
